attributes.action: Reduce MPs expenses in line with public allowances for unemployed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to limit all MPs expenses to the amount that can be claimed by unemployed people on benefits.  This means they could only claim for essential items at reasonable cost thus immediately reducing expenditure and making MPs realise the problems the  public have during difficult economic times.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
